img_01.tr_desc: Select a family head, then create the family member list to be able to schedule congregation meetings better.

img_02.tr_desc: From next week to next year – all your congregation’s upcoming events in one easy view.

img_03.tr_desc: Add language groups in the congregation settings and schedule the meetings more flexible.

improvements.tr_note_01: Show weekend meeting songs in exported schedule
New languages added: Brazilian Sign Language, Tahitian
